description: Details of Replacement Roof pursuant to consition 6 of planning permission PP/2014/0590 dated 20/06/2014 for 'Construction of a single storey plant room building with a swan neck connection to the main building and an adjoining enclosed external open plant compound to the west of the main building, together with external and internal alterations to the main building including roof maintenance and replacement works, curtain wall seal replacement, floor tile replacement, fire stopping to the floor slab and curtain walling, plant room draught proofing, transformer room bunding improvements, HV switchroom replacement works and new partitions/doors in ground floor plant room, internal lighting, services connections to external plant and painting the east and west elevations of the main building following the removal of existing internal plant and machinery (Listed Building Consent)
